abstracts.cdata!:
This Results Profile focuses on the poor
            and rural communities of Yemen. Demand for basic
            infrastructure and employment were very high in poor, remote
            areas of the country. Public Works Program, supported by
            World Bank, has delivered 3,900 sub-projects, creating more
            than 7.4 million jobs for Yemenis. As a result, in the
            education sector, the enrollment of students increased
            considerably. In the health sector, immunization increased
            by 62 percent. In the water sector, the number of houses
            supplied with clean water increased by 29 percent.
